mapper.select: SELECT question_no questionNo, question_title questionTitle, customer_id customerId, createdate FROM question ORDER BY question_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT question_no questionNo, customer_id customerId, question_title questionTitle, question_content questionContent, createdate FROM question WHERE question_no = #{questionNo}

SELECT question_no questionNo, question_title questionTitle, question_content questionContent, customer_id customerId FROM question WHERE question_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{questionTitle}, '%') LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question WHERE question_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{questionTitle}, '%')
